text: læa mi xari kæ phwk khea kranan hrux thi xallxhˌ ca mi thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea thang «thi phwk khea khadkhwang mi hı khea masyidil ha rxm læa phwk khea k michı phu pkkhrxng masyid nan dwy brrda phu pkkhrxng masyid nan chı khır xun mi nxkcak brrda phu yakerng theanan tæthwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
